name: zeroplayers
description: An entertainment experiment done in my spare time to play for being like God

scripts.Baldanjs-update: npm run Baldanjs-update-git-add && npm run Baldanjs-update-change-name-start && npm run Baldanjs-update-git-pull &&  npm run Baldanjs-update-git-push-to-Baldanjs
scripts.Baldanjs-update-git-push-to-Baldanjs: git add ./f_arraysManipulation.js && git commit -m "update" && git push -u https://github.com/GuillermoBaldan/Baldanjs.git develop
scripts.echotests: npm run echotest1 && npm run echotest2

author: Guillermo Baldán López
